mapper.select: select d.sidoName, d.gugunName, d.dongName, h.apartmentName from dongcode d join houseinfo h on d.dongCode = h.dongcode where h.apartmentName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CONCAT(d.sidoName, ' ', d.gugunName, ' ', d.dongName) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT i.aptCode, CONCAT(d.sidoName, ' ', d.gugunName, ' ', d.dongName) AS road FROM house_subscription s JOIN houseinfo i ON s.aptCode = i.aptCode JOIN dongcode d ON i.dongCode = d.dongCode WHERE s.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT s.aptCode, i.apartmentName, i.aptCode, CONCAT(d.sidoName, ' ', d.gugunName, ' ', d.dongName) AS road, CONCAT(h.dealYear, '-', h.dealMonth, '-', h.dealDay) as dealDate, h.dealAmount FROM house_subscription s JOIN houseinfo i ON s.aptCode = i.aptCode JOIN dongcode d ON i.dongCode = d.dongCode JOIN housedeal h ON s.aptCode = h.aptCode WHERE s.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(h.dealYear, '-', h.dealMonth, '-', h.dealDay), '%Y-%m-%d') DESC limit 1;
